body:
You seem to misunderstand my request: I call the build with a simple script which automates everything including the tests:
```
        export GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP=/usr/lib/go1.4.3
        cd src
        ./all.bash
```
There should be an option that we can pass to "all.bash", such as --skip-tests, or --skip-test=\<test-name\>, or an environment variable that can be set the same way in order to specify which test we can skip.
